name: Introduction to Owin, Katana and Helios Part 1 - AstroCoder
caption: astrocoder.com
description: Other than the cool names What are OWIN , Katana and Helios ?!! Before we we get into that let’s see what’s the problems that they are meant to address, In the early day of asp.net Microsoft was trying to push everyone in the web direction so they were trying to make everything auto configured …
